title: India's Stars and AI: Bollywood vs. Technology
description: Bollywood celebrities in India are urging judicial intervention to safeguard their voice and persona amid the rise of artificial intelligence. This movement highlights the stars' concerns over the potential misuse and commodification of their identities as AI technologies continue to advance.
content: Bollywood celebrities are rallying for legal protection against artificial intelligence in New Delhi. They are concerned about the preservation of their voice and persona as AI technologies continue to evolve, potentially threatening their personal b... [384 chars]

title: IT sector sees subdued growth in FY26, AI-powered rebound in next fiscal: Report
description: NEW DELHI, Oct 2:  The Indian IT sector is experiencing subdued growth, with industry guidance and recent results pointing towards a muted outlook for FY26, though a recovery in FY27 is possible with recovery in key export markets and adoption of new technology.   According to HSBC Global Research, near-term discretionary spending among clients remains weak, but there are signs of acceleration in the next fiscal year, especially as adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) among enterprises gathers pace. “While the […]

title: OpenAI hits $500 billion mark as SoftBank, others buy shares: Report
description: The latest valuation marks a sharp rise from the company’s previous valuation of $300 billion and highlights how quickly OpenAI’s value has grown as demand for artificial intelligence tools continues to rise.
content:
OpenAI, the maker of ChatGPT, has reached a valuation of $500 billion after a share sale by employees, reported news agency Reuters. The deal involved current and former employees selling about $6.6 billion worth of shares to investors.

title: Can Artificial Intelligence 'Pray' To God? Gemini’s Response To Kerala Priest Goes Viral
description: A video of Kerala priest Fr. Joseph Vettikuzhichalil chatting with Gemini AI has gone viral after the AI said it would “pray to God” for his health, sparking debate on whether artificial intelligence can truly engage in prayer.

title: More cameras and artificial intelligence to boost Palma city security
description: An investment of €138,718 will see the contract completed within two months. A fixed patrol already operates in Plaza España and will now be backed by the new surveillance system.

title: Germany's DeepL is considering going public in US, Bloomberg reports
description: DeepL, a Germany-based developer of artificial intelligence-based translation, is considering an initial public offering in the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.
content:
FRANKFURT, Oct 2 (Reuters) - DeepL, a Germany-based developer of artificial intelligence-based translation, is considering an initial public offering in the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.

title: Samsung, SK hynix to supply chips to OpenAI
description: South Korea's top two semiconductor manufacturers Samsung Electronics Co. and SK hynix Inc. will supply OpenAI Inc., the world's largest artificial intelligence (AI) company, with up to 900,000 wafers of DRAM per month by 2029, according to a report by Pulse, the English service of Maeil Business Newspaper Korea.

title: Global Chipmakers Add $200 Billion In Record Rally On AI Frenzy
description: Global chipmakers saw their market value soar as investors rushed to get exposure to artificial intelligence, the latest sign of a frenetic bull run that is pushing tech stocks to all-time highs.
